page.title: 09OPINIONS ON MORETON MARKET
page.content: Four local shopkeepers all agree that the{Market} is good for Moreton. They thought that about 80 per cent of shopkeepers would also agree. Two said that it could be improved by better{traffic control.}The other two said it could be improved by being smaller because there are too many of the same stalls and they go too near to the main road.They all said they get{more customers}on a Tuesday, and on a Wednesday morning outside their shop it is{cleaner}than any other day of the week. Some form of{seating}would be an advantage to those spending the whole day in the town. The{cheap} {transport}provided encourages many people to come to Moreton on a Tuesday.This keeps the town{busy}which is very important for shopkeepers.
